name: ebayKZ-darkgreen feb2020
description: Dark green and transparent style with changeable background (edit style, change body background url to whatever you like).

user.name: NMND
user.about: Good for nuffin, black-green fetishist, amateur webcoder.

additional_info:
Hey!

I mainly created this style for myself, maybe some of my friends, because most websites burn your eyes out at night.
Feel free to use it. It might not be updated regularily and there might be bugs. All that is changed are some CSS lines. CSS might be optimizable, too, but who cares, right? :D

The background image I found on google (this is not a capitalist endeavour), it is just meant as an example. If you are the creator and this bothers you, let me know!

I also hid one or two advertisement banners. AdBlock-Users like me don't see those anyways, they just screw with the layout.

I went through most pages and removed everything bright (except user pictures AND Textareas!)
If you find any white elements or other problems, please send me a screenshot.
To contact me, find me on reddit and shoot me a message (eng+ger supported): https://www.reddit.com/user/NMND-Floh/posts/

Enjoy!

update 001: 20.02.2020
- Incoming messages: darker background, bordered (was white).
